univie.cs.psps.utils
Interface AggregationProtocol

All Known Implementing Classes:
PushPullCD, PushPullED, PushSumCD, PushSumED
public interface AggregationProtocol

An interface for aggregation protocols to be observed by AggregationProtocolObserver.

Author:
Dario Seidl

Method Summary
 double getEstimate()
          Returns an estimation of the aggregate over all nodes.
 double getTrueValue()
          Returns the value as reported by the node, it should not be modified by the protocol.
